headline.main: Coca-Cola financia a científicos que buscan explicaciones alternativas para la obesidad

docs.snippet: Expertos médicos afirman que Coca-Cola busca desviar las críticas sobre el papel que las bebidas azucaradas han jugado en las cifras de obesidad y diabetes tipo 2....
docs.lead_paragraph: Expertos médicos afirman que Coca-Cola busca desviar las críticas sobre el papel que las bebidas azucaradas han jugado en las cifras de obesidad y diabetes tipo 2.

headline.main: Halfway There: Bon Jovi to Play Vancouver After Cancellation
headline.print_headline: Halfway There: Bon Jovi to Play Vancouver After Cancellation

docs.lead_paragraph: Jon Bon Jovi announced that he will perform in Vancouver this weekend, after his show was initially cancelled when the concert's promoter went bankrupt.

headline.main: Pedro Will Ease Chelsea Reliance on Hazard Says Hudson
headline.print_headline: Pedro Will Ease Chelsea Reliance on Hazard Says Hudson

docs.snippet: Chelsea's signing of Barcelona forward Pedro will take a lot of weight off the shoulders of playmaker Eden Hazard, former Stamford Bridge favourite Alan Hudson said on Thursday....

headline.main: Chafee Thanks Comedian O'Brien for Unsolicited Campaign Song

headline.main: Q&A: How Turbulence in China Stocks Masks a Bigger Story
headline.print_headline: Q&A: How Turbulence in China Stocks Masks a Bigger Story

docs.snippet: Doubts about China have rattled investors' nerves this summer. A plunge in the country's high-flying stock market along with sudden drops in its currency have heightened fears about the world's second-largest economy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Doubts about China have rattled investors' nerves this summer. A plunge in the country's high-flying stock market along with sudden drops in its currency have heightened fears about the world's second-largest economy.

headline.main: Jeb Bush Cites Ted Cruz and Marco Rubio in Defending Birthright Citizenship

docs.snippet: Jeb Bush mentioned two rivals for the Republican presidential nomination in defending birthright citizenship, saying they might not be able to run for president if some in the conservative wing of the Republican Party had their way....

headline.main: Greek PM quits, asks president to call elections
headline.sub: Greek PM quits, asks president to call elections

docs.snippet: Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras resigns hoping to strengthen his hold on power in snap elections after seven months in office in which he fought Greece's creditors for a better bailout deal. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras resigns hoping to strengthen his hold on power in snap elections after seven months in office in which he fought Greece's creditors for a better bailout deal. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: Crawford Will Defend Junior Welterweight Title Against Jean
headline.print_headline: Crawford Will Defend Junior Welterweight Title Against Jean

docs.snippet: Terence "Bud" Crawford will make his first defense of his WBO junior welterweight title against No. 2 contender Dierry Jean of Canada on Oct. 24 in Omaha....
